docs.snippet: Richard Sherman, Jonathan Martin and Michael Sam are young African-American players who can introduce much-needed change in the league....
docs.lead_paragraph: Richard Sherman, Jonathan Martin and Michael Sam are young African-American players who can introduce much-needed change in the league.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column holds that Richard Sherman, Jonathan Martin and Michael Sam are young African-American players who can introduce much-needed change in the NFL; says they are are triumphant figures the NFL should embrace.

headline.main: Three Stand as Test Cases for the Hidebound N.F.L.

docs.snippet: In a session that lasted more than 12 minutes, Michael Sam conducted his first news conference since he publicly declared that he was gay....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a session that lasted more than 12 minutes, Michael Sam conducted his first news conference since he publicly declared that he was gay.
docs.abstract: NFL draft prospect Michael Sam meets with reporters at Lucas Oil Stadium; unlike any other soon-to-be professional football players, he wears button representing gay pride at his first news conference since publicly declaring his sexual orientation.

headline.main: At N.F.L. Combine, Michael Sam Says He Wants Focus on Field
headline.print_headline: At Combine, Gay Player Says He Wants Attention to Stay on Field

docs.snippet: The running back Ray Rice was charged with simple assault and is accused of knocking out his fiancée, Janay Palmer, last weekend in Atlantic City....
docs.lead_paragraph: The running back Ray Rice was charged with simple assault and is accused of knocking out his fiancée, Janay Palmer, last weekend in Atlantic City.
docs.abstract: Baltimore Ravens express concern after watching an online video that shows running back Ray Rice dragging a woman out of a casino elevator; Rice is accused of striking his fiancee Janay Palmer in Atlantic City.

docs.snippet: In a hearing before the National Labor Relations Board in Chicago, Northwestern players have laid out an argument that they are employees entitled to unionize....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a hearing before the National Labor Relations Board in Chicago, Northwestern players have laid out an argument that they are employees entitled to unionize.
docs.abstract: National Labor Relations Board panel hears testimony concerning whether Northwestern football players should have the right to collectively bargain as university employees; attempt by college players to unionize is a first.

headline.main: Test in Northwestern Case: Is College Football a Job?
headline.print_headline: Test in Northwestern Case: Is College Football a Job?

docs.snippet: Veteran NBA player Jason Collins signed a 10-day contract with the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday, making him the first openly gay athlete on a team roster in any of North America's four major professional sports leagues....
